name: polytone - Rhythm Game
description:
polytone is a first-person rhythm game.

Tap on the square-shaped music notes as they fly towards you along the music.

Unique visual elements and curated music collections are our ways to provide you a brand new rhythm game experience.

polytone offers a collection of 98 selected tracks (26 free-to-play + 6 unlockable + 66 purchasable) with more than 250 levels for your challenges. The collection features top-tier EDM producers, Doujin composers and releases from renowned music labels.

Powered by "CRIWARE". CRIWARE is a trademark of CRI Middleware Co., Ltd.
